summary.Title: Shipyard Welders Wanted
summary.Presentation:
We are looking for:

Shipyard Welders
TIG Welders
MIG/MAG Welders
Aluminum Welders

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for:

  • Shipyard Welders
  • TIG Welders
  • MIG/MAG Welders
  • Aluminum Welders

 for marine industry in Danmark 

Scan Con offers jobs at the Shipyards on Reparation and New Build Departments. 

Key tasks:

  • Help build and repair ships
  • Replace or repair metal parts of a ship's structure
  • Weld various types of metal, following blueprints and ensuring that the structure can withstand the pressure of the ocean
  • Inspect structures or materials to be welded
  • Monitor the welding process and adjust heat as necessary
  • Maintain equipment and machinery
  • Use a variety of equipment and methods to permanently join together various metal parts
  • Typically perform manual welding procedures using Shielded Metal Arc welding (SMAW) or Oxy-Acetylene torches, or use semiautomatic systems such as wire feeder machines
  • TIG welders - responsible for the fabrication and welding of aerospace tubular, sheet metal and casting engine components
  • TIG welders - tack welding, fabrication and fixtures to assist fabrication and welding

Skills:

  • English - must be able to communicate in English 
  • Mathematical skills to read blueprints, trim metal objects accurately and interpret model sketches
  • Understanding spatial reasoning for product dimensions
  • Comprehending 2D and 3D models correctly
  • Always attentive to detail and alert to ensure safety
  • Ability to receive and follow instructions and communicate with co-workers
  • Ability to read labels, safety warnings, and guidelines

Experience:

  • Experience from shipyards 
  • Education or professional experience in a given position

We offer you:

  • Attractive salary 
  • 37 hours per week with possibilities for overtime
  • Flight tickets
  • Transport to/ from job 
  • Accommodation 
  • Rotation 6 - 12 months 
  • Safety courses
  • Work tools and clothes
  • Help with Work Permit/VISA 
  • Health insurance / Medical help
